Class ConectareBD

java.lang.Object
bazaDate.ConectareBD
public class ConectareBD extends Object
Am folosit aceasta clasa pentru a ma conecta la baza de date

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public static Connection connect() throws SQLException
      Connects to the MySQL database using the provided database URL, username, and password.
      Returns:
      a Connection object representing the connection to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or the URL is incorrect.
